author: RTÉ Entertainment
title: Ronan Keating rewrites hit song with health message
description: Ronan Keating has rewritten his song When You Say Nothing At All to emphasise the importance of physical distancing and hygiene during the coronavirus pandemic, with an accompanying video featuring his pregnant wife Storm at an appropriate distance.
content:
Ronan Keating has rewritten his song When You Say Nothing At All to emphasise the importance of physical distancing and hygiene during the coronavirus pandemic, with an accompanying video featuring his pregnant wife Storm at an appropriate distance.
